title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Mobile Learning-Supported Library Utilization: Learning with Smart Devices

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Students can explore library digital resources (e-books, audiobooks) and utilize them for language learning via mobile devices
Students can autonomously complete language learning courses within the school library using location-based technologies (QR codes, etc.)
Students can analyze digital library materials and complete language projects collaboratively with peers using mobile collaboration tools (Padlet, etc.)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
